title: Ecological selectivity and the evolution of mammalian substrate preference across the K-Pg boundary
citation: Hughes, J. J., Berv, J. S., Chester, S. G. B., Sargis, E. J., & Field, D. J. (2021). Ecological selectivity and the evolution of mammalian substrate preference across the K-Pg boundary. Ecology and Evolution, 11, 14540-14554. https://doi.org/10.1002/ece3.8114
